content: readme.md linux-icons native linux icons nodejsimprove linux support your nodejs application using system icon themes. icons should placed under of freedesktop icons location standards /usr/share/icons/hicolor/status current version supports:inheritssizes (svg icons are resized using geticonbuffer)icon contexts to install packagenpm install --save linux-icons order get full path an iconconst icons = require('linux-icons')let iconpath = icons.geticon.sync('myicon-name', 22, icons.context.status)asyncconst icons = require('linux-icons')icons.geticon('myicon-name', 22, icons.context.status, iconpath => { console.log(iconpath)}) to the buffer itconst icons = require('linux-icons')let icon = icons.geticonbuffer.sync('myicon-name', 22, icons.context.status)asyncconst icons = require('linux-icons')icons.geticonbuffer('myicon-name', 22, icons.context.status, buffer => { console.log(buffer)})note: electron tray icons does support svg icons. will to geticonbuffer nativeimage.createfrombuffer. the examples folder.todo auto-detect de get right icon theme name async version clean code! scaling factor
